TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed IDispatchImplType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates which `IDispatch` implementation to use for a particular class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType CompatibleImpl = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the `IDispatch` implementation is supplied by passing the type information for the object to the COM `CreateStdDispatch` API method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType InternalImpl = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the `IDispatch` implementation is supplied by the runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType SystemDefinedImpl = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the common language runtime decides which `IDispatch` implementation to use.
